title: Diamond Mangalsutra Pendant - "Shobha"
materials: 18K Rose Gold with Brilliant Cut Diamonds
VS Clarity. Features Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting sheen.
features: A modern interpretation of the traditional Mangalsutra pendant. The design features an open-work geometric pattern meticulously set with sparkling diamonds, creating a lightweight yet impactful statement. The symmetric design is influenced by traditional south indian architecture, which blends tradition with contemporary style.
description: This pendant offers a contemporary take on the timeless Mangalsutra, perfect for the modern woman. The brilliant-cut diamonds are carefully selected for their clarity and brilliance, ensuring a radiant sparkle. The rose gold adds a touch of warmth and sophistication. Lightweight and comfortable for everyday wear, yet elegant enough for special occasions.
